name: Super Slime Pool
description:
SUPER SLIME POOL

I made this as an exercise to learn a little about the Godot game engine in the weekend jam #stopwaitingforgodot (https://itch.io/jam/stop-waiting-for-godot)

Click & drag on the cue ball to choose a launch direction, and release to fire!

The objective is to knock all the green slimes into the large grey slime.

You lose if the cue ball enters the large grey slime.
